resources.string: I am a student, tutor, engineer and a maker to various projects. For 3+ years, I have been working on Open Source.\n\n If you use any of my projects or like what I\'m doing, please consider backing me with simple donations so that I can continue my open source work.

The current build of the app is still in beta, and not extensively tested on various devices.\n\n If you find any issue or would like to request a feature feel free to use the below button and open an issue on the GitHub Repo.
you will get an active notification on the status bar while an app is using your camera or microphone.
you will get a haptic feedback every time any app starts using camera or microphone.
